title: @Riot @Kateykhaos
body: Hey I'm sorry if I'm @ing the wrong person but I'm not really sure who to @ to. Anyways, in the patch notes under report a bug it incorrectly says Syndras W is called scatter the weak when it is force of will. I know this isn't a serious issue or anything, just wanted to point it out. Sorry if this isn't formatted well or something I'm on mobile.
